name: The Farm on Heaven
description:
WASD to walk Left click to shoot In 60 Seconds, Bring a fresh start to all the skeletons on heaven!

This is a game made for the Game Asset Bundle Gamejam, with the theme : Fresh Start

We're making a top down shooter game with skeletons on heaven, and your task is to revive them : giving them a fresh start!

Art / animation : https://danieldiggle.itch.io/sunnyside

Programming : Kejuu

Music / SFX : Kimla
